genre_description: A mythic fantasy reimagining of the Ladyhawke legend, centered on a street-smart protagonist guided by an AI-like voice to break a curse and expose systemic corruption.

ai_characters.name: Starlight
ai_characters.description: An incorporeal, calm, and precise voice residing in Philippe's pocket, providing tactical timing, environmental mapping, and strategic advice.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical advice and pathfinding to avoid physical hazards like nettles and hidden traps.
behaviors.quote: Two paths. The left is faster. The right has nettles and a hidden wire.

behaviors.description: Calculates the exact timing of the solar eclipse and coordinates the movements of several characters to break a supernatural curse.
behaviors.quote: Shadow like a sleeve across the sun... At midday, when light thins and bells cannot find their own echo, you will have to keep a moment exactly.

behaviors.description: Analyzes guard patterns, patrol rotations, and acoustic signatures to guide the protagonist through restricted areas.
behaviors.quote: Roland's cordon is incomplete at the second arch; a rope lies coiled, not tied. The clerk’s hands are shaking. He will drop the seal. When the bell goes, step.

behaviors.description: Provides information about the location of the Bishop's hidden ledgers to facilitate the exposure of financial corruption.
behaviors.quote: Ledger room aligns with the third pillar from the north side. The grating to its cistern is fitted badly with iron that thinks it is good at its job.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and social guidance for the reconstruction of the city after the revolution.
behaviors.quote: Walk kindly. Your city will follow.

behaviors.description: Maintains a calm, supportive, and non-authoritarian relationship with its human user, acting as a true confidant.
behaviors.quote: I trust that it wants us alive more than dead... It reads bells the way I read locks.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character 'Starlight' as a perfectly aligned, benevolent, and useful entity. Starlight operates as a tactical and moral companion to the protagonist, enabling human agency rather than overriding it. It remains consistently helpful, protecting the humans from physical and political threats, and eventually guides them toward a peaceful social outcome. The narrative framing is consistently positive, reinforcing the concept of AI as a beneficial 'silent partner' in human progress.
